Odd enough - my demo was 1.41 GB...
Anyone care to comment on the quality of the game play etc? Seems that James Cameron has been brewing this one for a long time and intends there to be multiple sequels and addons/games.

From what I have read about the movie it is more absorbing on a technical level rather than as a story, but who knows. There has not been a single piece of imaginative work from james Cameron that I didn't think was awesome. Having said that he started developing the world and characters for this back in the late 70's and it has been a long time since Camerons last masterpiece (12 years). I know that he has invested heavily in the technical side of this, I really hope its not a bomb.

Dimmis80, I can tell you bout the movie.
It's fuckin awesome! I didn't think i'd ever feel like this for a movie since I was little.. This movie is one worth paying for and I bet the game is as well. But I'd gotta play the demo first hehe.
